posts.post_title: F/S  T206 COBB Bat On  SGC 40 Sovereign Back
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Tim Kindler
For Sale: 1910 T206 Ty Cobb  Bat On Shoulder  SGC 40/3  Sovereign Back.

Card is centered just slightly high, and the slightest/faintest wrinkles- 1 in the top left corner about 1 cm down and is about a cm wide, and one by his collar.  The wrinkles don't show up in the scan and the one by his collar can't even be seen when looking at the card until you tilt it in the light. Neither one of the wrinkles is a crease which goes through the card and can be seen on the back of the card.

 SOLD THANK YOU FOR ALL THOSE WHO INQUIRED>

Thanks,
